target.query:
from(bucket: "ns")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "treatments")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "notes")

description: original DB from justmara, adapted to mg/dL

targets.query:
from(bucket: "ns")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "openaps")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "bg" )
  |> aggregateWindow(every: 1m, fn: last, createEmpty: false)
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({ r with 
    _value: r._value,
    _measurement: ""
    }))

from(bucket: "ns")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "openaps")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "autoISF_ratio" 
    or r["_field"] == "acceISF_ratio" 
    or r["_field"] == "bgISF_ratio"
    or r["_field"] == "deltaISF_ratio"
    or r["_field"] == "duraISF_ratio"
    or r["_field"] == "ppISF_ratio")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._value > 0)
  |> aggregateWindow(every: 1m, fn: last, createEmpty: false)
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({ r with 
    _value: if r._field == "autoISF_ratio" then r._value else r._value,
    _measurement: ""
    }))

from(bucket: "ns")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "treatments")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "carbs" or r["_field"] == "notes")
  |> pivot(rowKey: ["_time"], columnKey: ["_field"], valueColumn: "_value")
  |> sort(columns: ["_time"], desc: true)
  |> group()
  |> sort(columns: ["_time"], desc: true)
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({ time: time(v:r._time), carbs: r.carbs, notes: r.notes }))

from(bucket: "ns")
  |> range(start: -15m, stop: now())
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "openaps")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "bg")
  |> limit(n: 2)
  |> derivative(unit: 5m)
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({ value: r._value }))

import "experimental/aggregate"

t1 = from(bucket: "ns")
  |> range(start: -15m, stop: now())
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "openaps")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "bg")
  |> limit(n: 2)
  |> derivative(unit: 5m)
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({ index: 0, name: "Ⲇ 5m", value: r._value }))

t2 = from(bucket: "ns")
  |> range(start: -30m, stop: now())
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "openaps")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "bg")
  |> limit(n: 4)
  |> derivative(unit: 5m)
  |> movingAverage(n: 3)
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({ index: 1, name: "Ⲇ 15m", value: r._value }))

t3 = from(bucket: "ns")
  |> range(start: -45m, stop: now())
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "openaps")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "bg")
  |> limit(n: 9)
  |> derivative(unit: 5m)
  |> movingAverage(n: 8)
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({ index: 2, name: "Ⲇ 40m", value: r._value }))

union(tables: [t3, t2, t1])
  |> sort(columns: ["index"])
  |> drop(columns: ["index"])

from(bucket: "ns")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "openaps")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "reason")
  |> pivot(rowKey: ["_time"], columnKey: ["_field"], valueColumn: "_value")
  |> group()
  |> sort(columns: ["_time"], desc: true)
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({ time: time(v:r._time), reason: r.reason }))

from(bucket: "ns")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "openaps")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "bg")
  |> keep(columns: ["_value"])
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({_value: r._value, label: if r._value < 70 then "low" else if r._value < 180 then "normal" else "high" }))
  |> group(columns: ["label"])
  |> count()
  |> group()

from(bucket: "ns")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "openaps")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "iob" or r["_field"] == "basal_iob")

from(bucket: "ns")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "openaps")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "bg" 
    or r["_field"] == "bg" 
    or r["_field"] == "isf"
    or r["_field"] == "target_bg"
    or r["_field"] == "activity")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._value > 0)
  |> aggregateWindow(every: 1m, fn: last, createEmpty: false)
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({ r with 
    _value: if r._field == "bg" or r._field == "target_bg" then r._value else if r._field == "activity" then r._value*500.0 else r._value,
    _measurement: ""
    }))

from(bucket: "ns")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "treatments")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["type"] == "bolus")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "bolus")
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({ r with 
    _measurement: "",
    _field: if r.smb == "true" then "bolus smb" else r._field, 
    }))
  |> drop(columns: ["type", "smb"])

from(bucket: "ns")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "treatments")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["type"] == "tbs" and r["_field"] == "rate")
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({ _time: r._time, "basal": (r._value * -100.0)}))

from(bucket: "ns")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "openaps")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "bg")
  |> keep(columns: ["_value"])
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({_value: r._value, label: if r._value < 70 then "low" else if r._value < 140.4 then "normal" else "high" }))
  |> group(columns: ["label"])
  |> count()
  |> group()

panels.description: use longer timeframe, at least 7 days

targets.query:
from(bucket: "ns")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "openaps")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "tdd" or r["_field"] == "isf")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._value > 0)
  |> timedMovingAverage(every: 5m, period: 1d)



  |

panels.title: TDD vs. smoothed ISF

targets.query:
from(bucket: "ns")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "openaps")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "bg")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._value > 0)
  |> aggregateWindow(every: 5m, fn: last, createEmpty: false)

from(bucket: "ns")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "openaps")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "pred_zt" or r["_field"] == "pred_uam" or r["_field"] == "pred_iob")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._value > 0)
  |> timeShift(duration: 90m)
  |> aggregateWindow(every: 5m, fn: last, createEmpty: false)

from(bucket: "ns")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "openaps")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "dev" or r["_field"] == "cob")
  |> aggregateWindow(every: 5m, fn: last, createEmpty: false)
  |> pivot(rowKey: ["_time"], columnKey: ["_field"], valueColumn: "_value")
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({ r with _measurement: "", is_cob : if r.cob > 0 then 1 else 0, _value: r.dev }))
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r.is_cob <= 0)
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({ _time: r._time, dev: r.dev }))

from(bucket: "ns")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "openaps")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "dev" or r["_field"] == "cob")
  |> aggregateWindow(every: 5m, fn: last, createEmpty: false)
  |> pivot(rowKey: ["_time"], columnKey: ["_field"], valueColumn: "_value")
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({ r with _measurement: "", is_cob : if r.cob > 0 then 1 else 0, _value: r.dev }))
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r.is_cob > 0)
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({ _time: r._time, dev_cob: r.dev }))

from(bucket: "ns")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "openaps")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "cob" or r["_field"] == "cr")
  |> aggregateWindow(every: 1m, fn: last, createEmpty: false)
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({ r with _measurement: "" }))

title: Type1-Data
